title: Street hypnosis with Fascination - the hypnotic power of the gaze / Non-verbal hypnosis
description:
The woman in the video is a student of Dr. Marco Paret who is learning non-verbal hypnosis techniques. Dr. Paret uses fascination - the power of the gaze and the woman enters a deep hypnotic induction state. This demonstrates that non-verbal hypnosis can be done everywhere, even on the street. After the strong hypnotic experience, she feels deeply transformed. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
